Desc.entry: Offers sports hall facilities including badminton, basketball, short tennis, volleyball, netball and five-a-side football. Aquatic facilities include lane swimming and leisure swimming. Fitness facilities include classes for all ages and abilities. Over 80 classes per week to include Active Lifestyle Programme and Kids Fitness. Fitness Unlimited membership available. Offers conference and exhibition facilities and private parties/celebrations. The venue is managed by Sheffield International Venues.

DisabledAccess.entry: Lift, Changing Rooms, Changing Places toilet/changing Room
